query: void memcpy_scalar(void* dest, const void* src, size_t n) { char* d = (char*)dest; const char* s = (const char*)src; while (n--) *d++ = *s++; }
code_v0_no_empty_lines: void memcpy_scalar(void* dest, const void* src, size_t n) { char* d = (char*)dest; const char* s = (const char*)src; while (n--) *d++ = *s++; }
